p: Figure 1 shows the MICs of the antibiotics and the synergistic effects of the fixed oil in association with aminoglycoside antibiotics. A significant synergistic MIC reduction effect was observed with amikacin and gentamicin against S. aureus (SA-10). On the other hand, a significant antagonistic effect was observed in the amikacin activity against E. coli. The oilâ€™s modifying activity over aminoglycoside antibiotics varied according to the antibiotic type associated with the oil and the bacterial strain analyzed.
